pr_title: KEYCLOAK-13127 Update Account Console to Account REST API v1

timeline.author: slaskawi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,54 @@

+
+package org.keycloak.common.enums;
+
+import java.util.Collections;
+import java.util.Map;
+import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
+
+/**
+ * @author Vaclav Muzikar <vmuzikar@redhat.com>
+ */
+public enum AccountRestApiVersion {
+    V1("v1");
+
+    public static final AccountRestApiVersion DEFAULT = V1;
+    private static final Map<String,AccountRestApiVersion> ENUM_MAP;

replies.bodyText: I don't think we want a Map where Enum is the key here.
replies.author: vmuzikar

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't need to be concurrent - Enums are initialized only once.
timeline.author: slaskawi

replies.bodyText: Good catch, I'll fix that. Thanks.
replies.author: vmuzikar
